container.p: XforJ is a compiler written in java that allows you to create powerful Javascript Templates. Javascript Templates allow you to seperate the View from your app's Model or Data.

p.i: "XforJ is to JSON what XSL is to XML."

container.p: XforJ was born out of my need for powerful javascript templates. I spent some time looking at other options, but they all fell short of what I was accustomed to using XSL with XML. I wanted that same power in XSL using javascript, hence the name XforJ.
